<S%H6258>"Now<s%> the <S%H834>reason<s%> I have <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> to my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> is <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> have <S%H3372>made<s%> me <S%H3372>afraid;<s%> so your <S%H8198>maidservant<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> 'Let me <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H194>perhaps<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> will <S%H6213>perform<s%> the <S%H1697>request<s%> of his <S%H519>maidservant.<s%>
